Title: Provides for the re-enfranchisement of voters with felony convictions; repealer
Summary: Provides for the re-enfranchisement of voters with felony convictions by repealing certain provisions in the election law.
LawCode: Rpld ยง5-106 subs 2, 3, 4 & 5, ยง5-708 sub 2, amd ยง5-400, El L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to qualifications of voters convicted of a felony; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
